hero.name: I'm Ubaidullah
hero.description: Front-end creativity brought to life with clean visuals and joyful interactions.

right.caption: ABOUT ME
right.description: I'm a frontend developer who loves turning ideas into smooth, interactive, and visually striking digital experiences. I focus on performance, pixel-perfect UI, and making the web a more delightful place.

card1.title: UI Solutions
card1.description: Crafting sleek and scalable UI solutions with a focus on intuitive design.

card2.title: Creative Impact
card2.description: Web interfaces that help brands grow and audiences connect.

service.caption: WHAT I DO
service.description: I design and develop responsive, user-friendly interfaces that bring ideas to life through modern, interactive, and visually captivating web solutions.

card1.title: Modern UI Development
card1.description: I craft visually appealing layouts using clean code, smooth animations, and a mobile-first approach to ensure an excellent user experience.

card2.title: Responsive Web Design
card2.description: Every project I build adapts perfectly to all device sizes — giving users a smooth and consistent experience on phones, tablets, and desktops.

card3.title: Creative Interactions
card3.description: From smooth animations to fun interactions — I make websites feel alive, memorable, and full of personality.

portfolio.caption: LATEST PROJECTS
portfolio.title: Transforming Ideas into Functional Web Experiences
portfolio.description: A collection of my front-end projects built with creativity, clean code, and a strong focus on smooth user experience and responsive design.

eduandexp.caption: EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE
eduandexp.title: Growing Skills Through Code & Creativity
eduandexp.description: A journey of continuous learning — from foundational studies to building unique and performance-driven web experiences.

card1.title: Bachelor in Computer Science
card1.description: Built strong fundamentals in programming, web technologies, and problem-solving with hands-on project development.

card2.title: Frontend Development Course
card2.description: Specialized in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Tailwind, and UI best practices, ensuring strong design + development workflow.

card1.caption: INTERNSHIP
card1.title: Frontend Developer Intern
card1.description: Built responsive UI components, improved website performance, and collaborated with designers to create clean modern interfaces.

card2.caption: Freelance
card2.title: React Developer
card2.description: Worked with clients to build landing pages, portfolio websites, and dashboards with focus on speed, usability & UI polish.
